name: Puzzle Pieces 5: Fairy Ring
description:
Go on a Wonderful Jigsaw Journey and earn Mana to reveal a magical world. Enjoy this interesting puzzle images in this fairy adventure. Play 7 chapters with more than 250 HD levels. This game is 100% perfection, attention is paid to every detail, best in a his kind. Enjoy!



Puzzle Pieces 5: Fairy Ring is peaceful and relaxing. Each puzzle completed fills the Mana and each puzzle is 100% customizable with so many different puzzle shapes, the number of pieces desired, background, brightness, pictured images, ghosted images. You'll earn points for completing the puzzle with or without the timer.



Choose whether or not you want a Timer.Uncover the secrets hidden within the Enchanted Forest.

- 7 chapters with more than 250 HD levels
- Solve jigsaws, earn Mana and reveal magical Worlds
- Use completed puzzles as HD wallpapers!
- Use your own images and save completed puzzles
- 100% perfection
